member.name: N:NRules
member.summary: Contains types that implement runtime components of the rules engine.

member.name: N:NRules.AgendaFilters
member.summary: Contains types that implement filtering of matched rules as part of rules engine execution.

member.name: N:NRules.Aggregators
member.summary: Contains types that implement aggregation of facts as part of rules engine execution.

member.name: N:NRules.Diagnostics
member.summary: Contains types that facilitate troubleshooting and monitoring of the rules engine execution.

member.name: N:NRules.Diagnostics.Dgml
member.summary: Contains types that enable exporting rete network diagnostics as a DGML document.

member.name: N:NRules.Extensibility
member.summary: Contains types that enable extensibility of the rules engine.

member.name: N:NRules.RuleModel
member.summary: Contains types that represent rules in the canonical model form.

member.name: N:NRules.RuleModel.Builders
member.summary: Contains types that allow building rules at runtime in the canonical model form.

member.name: N:NRules.Fluent
member.summary: Contains types that allow loading internal DSL rules via reflection.

member.name: N:NRules.Fluent.Dsl
member.summary: Contains types that allow specifying rules using internal DSL in C#.

member.name: N:NRules.Json
member.summary: Contains types that implement serialization of rule definitions to/from JSON.
